title: Children as property owners
content:
Under the law, children born in a marriage (legitimate) and those born outside the marriage (illegitimate) have equal rights to property of the deceased parent. In this case, 

1.        What can they use as grounds to convince the clan elders? Opio and Achieng can inform the clan that the law does not discriminate between children born in and outside the marriage and that they are all entitled to the property. 
2.        Are there any structures at district level? 
3.        Where is the Administrator General’s office/representative at district level? What do they need to go to the Administrator General
4.        If that fails, then the children can report the matter to the office of the Administrator General who will then be able to offer them more assistance.
